title: ollama/ollama
summary: Official Ollama repo: run Llama 3, Mistral, Gemma and other LLMs locally with a single command-line tool and a built-in model registry.

title: ollama-python
summary: Official Python SDK for Ollama; chat, generate, embed, pull and manage local models with a few lines of code.

title: ollama-js
summary: Official JavaScript/TypeScript client for Node and browsers; same API surface as the Python SDK.

title: langchain-ollama
summary: LangChain integration package exposing Ollama models as LLM, chat and embedding components.

title: ollama-webui (ollama-webui/ollama-webui)
summary: Feature-rich web UI for Ollama comparable to ChatGPT UI; chat history, multi-user, model management, RAG uploads.

title: ollama-cli
summary: Community-built interactive CLI wrapper with chat sessions, context persistence and markdown rendering.

title: ollama-copilot.vim
summary: Experimental fork adding Ollama backends to GitHub Copilot.vim for local LLM code completion.

title: ollama-rag
summary: Minimal RAG template using Ollama embeddings + Chroma vector store and Streamlit frontend.

title: ollama-haystack
summary: Haystack integration providing OllamaGenerator and OllamaEmbedder nodes for Haystack pipelines.

title: ollama-csharp
summary: Community-maintained C#/.NET client for Ollama with async streaming and dependency injection helpers.

title: ollama-helm
summary: Helm chart to deploy Ollama on Kubernetes with GPU node selector and PVC model cache.

title: ollama-nest
summary: NestJS module that wraps the Ollama JS client for injection into controllers/services.

title: ollama-rust
summary: Unofficial Rust crate exposing async/await bindings to the Ollama REST API.

title: ollama-docker-compose
summary: Official Docker Compose stack with CUDA runtime and WebUI sidecar for quick local deployments.

title: ollama-obsidian
summary: Obsidian plugin that adds a local AI assistant sidebar powered by Ollama models.

title: ollama-ray
summary: Ray Serve example deploying Ollama models for scalable batch inference.

title: ollama-go
summary: Community Go client generated from OpenAPI spec; supports chat, generate, pull and list operations.

title: ollama-chatbot-ui
summary: Lightweight React chatbot component that talks to Ollama via REST API; ships with Next.js example.

title: ollama-discord-bot
summary: Discord.py bot that routes user messages to local Ollama models with per-server model selection.

title: ollama-django
summary: Reusable Django app adding Ollama chat and embedding endpoints with admin UI for model management.
